summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of South on-half of Hanford Street from 37th Avenue South to Cascadia Avenue et al., in the City of Seattle by grading under Ordinance No. 20551 creating Local Improvement District No. 2039 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
